Package bpel.operations

Class Summary
Assign The assign bpel operation
BpelProcess Top level BPEL Process operation
Copy The copy bpel operation
Else Else operation, simply an ElseIf that always has a true condition
ElseIf ElseIf operation
Empty Completely empty operation, with a description only
Evaluation Evaluation of XPath expressions.
Exit End the process prematurely
If If node, NOTE: Differs from the normal BPEL spec, documented better in action
InternalNode All nodes that are parents of other nodes inherit from this class
Invoke Invoke node, calls an external service.
Ket More functions for evaluating XPath expressions, only used by Evaluation
LeafNode All nodes that have no child nodes inherit from this class
MainIf  
Operation Top level class for all operations
RepeatUntil Similar to while, except it runs at least once
Sequence A sequence simply runs all of it's children in order
Throw TODO: Throw and fault were giving me headaches when trying to get timings they are currently cut out until I have time to put them back in and debug.
Wait Wait for a period of time (IE ten seconds) or till a specific time ( IE 3pm on Tuesday )
While Basic loop functionality
 

Enum Summary
Invoke.CallType The type of calls that can be associated with an invoke
